ygData.subject: Re: BoF
ygData.msgSnippet: If you have jboots or a zone nearby its an excellent spell for killing guards.  Cast the bonds of force and run---you can get enough distance between you and
ygData.messageBody:
If you have jboots or a zone nearby its an excellent spell for killing
guards. Cast the bonds of force and run---you can get enough distance
between you and the guard to cast again with the guard never touching
you. I also used it on the double dwarves in BB. Would cast bonds of
force from as far away as I could, then root one of them and run run
run. Then you only had to fight one at a time.

Zoddie retired solro wizzie

>
> Bonds of Force? Serious? I've never touched that spell. I read up on it a
> little and I'm not sure if I want to experiment too much with it yet until I
> find a partner. (http://eq.castersrealm.com/) But it's an interesting idea
> thanks......
>
> --Lim'Dul
